metadata.title: CVE-2019-12387 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In Twisted before 19.2.1, twisted.web did not validate or sanitize URIs orHTTP methods, allowing an attacker to inject invalid characters such asCRLF.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12387` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-twisted - 16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-twisted-bin - 16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-twisted-core - 16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-twisted-mail - 16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-twisted-names - 16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-twisted-news - 16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-twisted-runner - 16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-twisted-web - 16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-twisted-words - 16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
python3-twisted - 16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-twisted-conch - 1:16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: twisted package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4').
twisted package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '16.0.0-1ubuntu0.4').
